# Constants.SerializeOptionsFull field

The converter used internally by LDtkFileFull with JsonSerializer.Deserialize(..., Constants.SerializeOptionsFull) not needed by the user just use .FromFile instead.

```csharp
public static readonly JsonSerializerOptions SerializeOptionsFull;
```
